title: I did a tarot reading on how some feels towards me. I got the death card, 10 of cups and knight of pentacles. What could this mean? - Quora

response.answer_text: either the person’s feelings for you are undergoing a transformation, or a scorpio is involved. 10 of cups is happy family life, and the knight of pentacles is usually a mature yet slow moving earth sign bringing a gift of financial importance.
